item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Dolci

Dolci is a beautiful new lounge that recently opened on State Street in the East Rock section of town.

The owner Anthony has been gracious enough to offer the following drink specials to the NHC from 6-9pm:

Bud Lights - $3

The following drinks are all being offered for $5:

- All Well Drinks
- Margaritas
- Cosmos
- Appletinis
- "Danzante" Pinot Grigio Wine
- "Villa Pozzi" Red Wine

All food plates and appetizers - $2 off


Your contact is: Jeanie (860) 942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
